item.title: PowerShell for IT Professionals [#8] – Manage everything with PowerShell
item.author: Kamil
item.description: Exercises Can you uninstall module that was installed with Install-Module? Confirm your answer with Get-Module -ListAvaiable Can you update the installed module? Perhaps, you’d like to install version 1.0.0.0 of SNMP module, how can you force Install-Module to do so? Install-Module error If you encounter the issue with downloading modules, run this commandlet as a temporary workaround (it must be applied every time the shell is restarted): [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.
